Text: This is the Alternate Ending.  The DVDRip and PiZ are regular Cut.  The regular cut stops when the FBI agent walks out the door with the 2 children (then credits roll).  This version continues for 2 more minutes and leaves less to the imagination...
sooo, if you want regular cut, press the stop button soon as the fbi agent walks out the door with the 2 children ;-) (at 1:35hr)
will you be upping this in the smaller (PSP, iPod, Zune) format?
nah, this extended doesn't make it any better.
do you think you could up just the extra 2 mins as a separate file?

no, what happens is they show the fbi agents finding a bomb, and then the screen pans to show another hidden bomb with a counter running on it.  thats it.

on the normal version they leave it to your imagination if there was a 4th bomb or not and it ends sort of on a more happy note.
on the DVD its called alternate ending, alternate doesn't necessarily mean good.  think of I am legend, i thought the alternate ending was lame.
